description.content:
If you're looking for a top-quality WordPress website or Landing Page that increases leads and sales, and highlights your brand identity, you've come to the right place.


Having 6+ years of experience in WordPress website design & development. Completed 1k+ projects for 500+ clients from 30+ countries in various marketplaces since 2016. Now I am here at Fiverr to provide quality service. I can design any custom WordPress website or landing page. I provide the highest quality service at the most competitive and affordable pricing.


What will be delivered?


  • Ô∏èResponsive for all devices
  • Design and Development From Scratch
  • Ô∏èFully functional
  • Attractive Color Combination and Branding
  • Ô∏èUnique design and typography
  • Professional Layout
  • Ô∏èAll browsers compatible
  • SEO Friendly
  • Speed optimized


What do I need from you?


  1. Design idea
  2. Domain
  3. cPanel/Hosting/ WordPress Login Info (if any)
  4. Logo, images
  5. Website content (if have)
  6. Color scheme


If you have any questions scroll down to my FAQ section for additional information.


"Send me a message now to discuss your project!"

questionsAndAnswers.question: Why do I trust you that you create a good elementor landing page for me and you make me happy? What proof do you have?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I have 6+ years of WordPress experience in different marketplaces, I have successfully built 1k+ Projects for 30+ countries - 500+ clients. Now I am a level Two seller on Fiverr. Since I have experience working in other marketplaces so I can show you some of my previous projects.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will I be able to edit my WordPress landing page easily?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Absolutely! I build landing page using a flexible and easy-to-configure page builder ( elementor pro ) You will be able to very easily add text & images to all pages with a click! For this you don't need any coding/programming knowledge. I will provide video for the maintenance of your site.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you provide any support after delivering the order, in case I need any further changes later?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I will always be there at your service. Just let me know if you need support at any point of time.üôÇ

questionsAndAnswers.question: I do not like the work I got from you. What should I do?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Firstly, contact me and tell me your opinion. If I can, I will make all the necessary changes to make you satisfied. If you are still not satisfied, you will receive a Full Refund without any problems.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Unlimited Revisions?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Unlimited revision does not mean a new design applies or Very HUGE changes. Revision means finishing/polishing details of what we have. üôÇ

questionsAndAnswers.question: What do you need to Started Work?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: First, I will need to know as much as possible about your landing page Requirements. then I will understand what you need üôÇ. Also, I can able to give you some Ideas/Suggestions. üôÇ

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will you Redesign or Customize or add New Design to my Existing Landing/Squeeze Page?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I can redesign your existing Landing/Squeeze with existing content. also Mobile Friendly too. I'll help you to find more Leads by making an awesome Design. üôÇ

questionsAndAnswers.question: I want to collect e-mail leads, can you help me?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I can help you get leads in a far superior way to sending people to a traditional e-mail opt-in form.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you create login registration(sign in- sign up)?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, obviously. I can create ::: 1. sign in - sign-up form 2. Social media sign-up option 3. registration form 4. Contact US form and they will work also when anyone fills up the form, you will get an email notification and the info will at your admin panel also.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you Provide Professional SEO Service?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: My service is exclusively on website design however I provide Yoast SEO Premium(GPL)/ Rank Math SEO Premiom (GPL) to optimize the website data for SEO. However if you need a professional SEO service for example Rank website on google with a specific keyword then you need to Hire SEO expert.

packageList.title: BASIC
packageList.description: Responsive 1-2 Pages Website/ Landing Page Design up-to 5 Sections
